root: ^You showed care and kindness to the everyday people that still choose this old Diner every week.
^You put in the work and effort to take care of this Diner, and appreciate it for what it is.
^That's why I want you to take over as owner.
^Obviously, I will train you. It will be a while until you are fully ready.
^But I cannot think of any other person more worthy than you, Graciana.
^(They extend out their hand to shake mine.)
